questions.question: He …………………… his frustration by yelling at me.
questions.description: To give vent to your emotions is to express them freely.

questions.question: Dishonesty is something I can never …………………………
questions.description: To put up with is to tolerate.

questions.question: A committee has been ………………………. to expedite the process.
questions.description: To set up is to establish.

questions.question: My grandfather …………………………. when he was eighty.
questions.description: To pass away is to die.

questions.question: The meeting has been …………………………. until Friday.
questions.description: To put off is to postpone.

questions.question: The health scare forced him to …………………………. smoking.
questions.description: To give up smoking is to quit smoking.

questions.question: At last he ………………………… to the temptation.
questions.description: To give in is to yield.

questions.question: She spends a lot of time and money to …………………………. abandoned dogs and cats.
questions.description: To take care of is to look after or nurse.

questions.question: His arrogance ……………………………… his fall.
questions.description: To bring something about is to make it happen.

questions.question: He ………………………….. the obstacles with great patience.
questions.description: To get around is to overcome.

questions.question: The plane is about to ……………………….. Fasten your seat belts.
She was …………………………. by his charm.
questions.description: When you are taken in, you are deceived.
